content: round 10 - ch1 *single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc in spsc 2 rounds directly below brim single_crochet in 2 double_crochet repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join place marker do skip stitches behind the spsc in first spsc of round 60 70 80 single_crochet 12 14 16 spsc brim round 1 - ch1 single_crochet in first double_crochet spsc in next st 2 rounds directly body below *single_crochet in next double_crochet spsc in next st 2 rounds directly below repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join do skip stitches behind the spsc 36 42 48 single_crochet 36 42 48 spsc round 11 ch2 double_crochet in each st around do not move marker brim round 2 ch1 single_crochet in first st and each st around 72 84 96 double_crochet slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 72 84 96 single_crochet round 12 ch1 *single_crochet spsc in marked spsc 2 rounds below and 3 cut yarn weave in ends and enjoy stitches in front of current position single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc in same spsc as have extra yarn leftover make a pom pom to add to the top of last spsc repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join move marker the hat up to first spsc of round 48 56 64 single_crochet 24 28 32 spsc www fancytigercrafts com 2 © fancy tiger crafts 2022
